item.title: Shutting Down The Department Of Education: Linda McMahon Lays Out The ‘Final Mission’
item.description: McMahon is officially setting in motion the end of the agency, after it has already cut many of its left-wing prorams.

item.title: Democrats Refused To Stand Up For The Mothers Of Laken Riley And Jocelyn Nungaray
item.description: Democrats in the room refused to stand and show respect for the victims' families, opting instead to ignore their suffering.

item.title: Elizabeth Warren Claps In Support Of Continuing Ukraine War For Five Years
item.description: The president pointed out Warren's support for the war with his long-time nickname referencing the senator's fake Indian identity.

item.title: Trump Destroys Radical Gender Ideology With Simple Message: Children Are ‘Perfect’ The Way God Made Them

item.title: Democrats Protest Trump’s Agenda Because It Forces Them To Celebrate America’s Wins
item.description: Democrats’ rebuff of Trump’s invitation to unify over the betterment of the nation is a manifestation of hatred for their own country.
